TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAnimation

summary.span: 支持对属性值进行动画处理。

span.span: Provides support for animating a property value.

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetCurrentValue (object defaultOriginValue, object defaultDestinationValue, System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetCurrentValue(object defaultOriginValue, object defaultDestinationValue, class System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock) cil managed
Public Function GetCurrentValue (defaultOriginValue As Object, defaultDestinationValue As Object, animationClock As AnimationClock) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetCurrentValue(System::Object ^ defaultOriginValue, System::Object ^ defaultDestinationValue, System::Windows::Media::Animation::AnimationClock ^ animationClock);
abstract member GetCurrentValue : obj * obj * System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock -> obj

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 提供动画的建议原始值，如果动画没有属于自己的起始值，则使用此值。

span.span: The suggested origin value to provide the animation, which is used if the animation does not have its own concept of a start value.

param.span: 如果该动画是组合链中的第一个动画，则此值将是快照值（如果存在的话）或是基属性值（如果不是快照值）；否则此值将是动画时钟不是 的链中前一个动画返回的值。

span.span: If this animation is the first in a composition chain, it is the snapshot value, if one is available, or the base property value, if it is not; otherwise, it is the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an animation clock that is not .

param.name: defaultDestinationValue
param.span: 提供动画的建议目标值，如果动画没有属于自己的结束值，则使用此值。

span.span: The suggested destination value to provide the animation, which is used if the animation does not have its own concept of an end value.

param.span: 如果动画位于属性上第一个动画组合层中，则此值将是基值；否则此值将是属性上前一个动画组合层中的输出值。

span.span: It is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise, it is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.

param.name: animationClock
param.span: 一个动画时钟，它可以生成供动画用来生成其输出值的 或 值。

span.span: The animation clock that can generate the or value to be used by the animation to generate its output value.

summary.span: 计算此动画认为应该为属性当前值的值。

span.span: Calculates the value this animation believes should be the current value for the property.

returns.span: 此动画信任的值应为该属性的当前值。

span.span: The value this animation believes should be the current value for the property.
